item.title: 'Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2' Rockets to No.1 with $145 million
item.description: LOS ANGELES, (Variety.com) - And just like that, Star-Lord and his band of super buddies are back on top of the box office.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Mars Science Lab launch delayed two years
item.description: NASA's launch of the Mars Science Laboratory -- hampered by technical difficulties and cost overruns -- has been delayed until the fall of 2011, NASA officials said at a news conference Thursday in Washington.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Nasa runs competition to help make old Fortran code faster
item.description: Two coders will share a $55,000 prize for what a Nasa official calls the "ultimate 'geek' dream assignment.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Retro tech: Flying car prototypes
item.description: How flying cars have gone from being a science fiction fantasy to almost becoming a reality, as seen through the BBC archive.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Antarctic iceberg crack develops fork
item.description: The fissure that will lead to the breakaway of one of the largest bergs ever seen has a new branch.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Secrets of tea plant revealed by science
item.description: Botanists unlock the genetic workings of the tea plant, in a move that could improve flavour.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: Machine learning
item.description: Many people are unsure about what machine learning is, but the chances are they are using it every day.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)

item.title: In the Future, Virtual Assistants Will Also Have Ideas of Their Own
item.description: Assistants could proactively recommend ways in which humans could be living better lives, from getting more exercise to watching informational videos.
item.author: janedoe@example.com (Jane Doe)
